itunes:title: how to have a GUILT FREE holiday season w/ britt
title: how to have a GUILT FREE holiday season w/ britt
itunes:author: Brittany Lupton
description:
NOV. 12 // NASHVILLE PODCAST EVENT TICKETS: CLICK HERE

today, britt is sharing 3 TIPS for letting go of guilt & enjoying the holiday season, WHILE keeping healthy habits in mind! You do NOT have to miss out this season & you also don't have to wait until the new year to work towards living a healthy lifestyle! Hear more details about the Podcast event & Brittany's November challenge, too!


Train with Britt Choose your program & join Britt's Nov, challenge!

Shop Gymshark Shop my favorite Gym Fits!


Follow the podcast

@funandgains.podcast


Follow Britt

insta // @_brittanylupton

youtube // Brittany Lupton

tiktok // brittanylupton

11:55 TIP #1 - BE PRESENT

19:58: TIP #3 - GET A ROUTINE
